Title: Relates to issuing a moratorium on utility termination of services during periods of pandemics and/or state of emergencies
Summary: Issues a moratorium on utility termination of services during periods of pandemics and/or state of emergencies.
LawCode: Amd ยง91, Pub Serv L; amd ยง5, Chap of 2020 (as proposed in S.8113-A & A.10521)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to issuing a moratorium on utility termination of services during periods of pandemics and/or state of emergencies; and to amend a chapter of the laws of 2020 amending the public service law, in relation to issuing a moratorium on utility termination of services during periods of pandemics and/or state of emergencies, as proposed in legislative bills numbers S.8113-A and A.10521, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
